alert.note: Alert for Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 10:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Wakulla County through 1045 PM EDT... At 1013 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crawfordville, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, Hilliardville, Bethel, Wakulla Springs and Arran. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
